column1: The @APWestRegion has deleted this Tweet. I guess they had second thoughts on parading their anti-religious bigotry to the world. What an embarrassing abuse of public trust to dehumanize victims of a horrific act of violence while ignoring 250000 murders committed by cartels. https://t.co/nU0ClMmPZC

Mexico is leaning dangerously toward becoming a failed state and we have not seen enough action toward addressing the threat that it presents to not only the Mexican people but to the American people. https://t.co/GLVUOOVGeD
Take my Halloween quiz. Which of these proposals offered by Democrat presidential candidates is scariest? https://t.co/YPQ5caAoPm
Just one more day of fighting to restore basic Constitutional principles such as separation of powers to our federal government. https://t.co/6HYhSdnH3j

In @BetoORourke America who will decide which disfavored religious beliefs will prompt retaliation by government?   We don’t want a government that punishes disfavored religious beliefs. https://t.co/nGwGi4YZTR

I had a good discussion about the 4th of July on an interview yesterday. I believe Americans have a lot to celebrate as we reflect on the greatness of our country and the role each of us play in that greatness. https://t.co/qe3WOjZF9l #FourthofJuly
A “right” is something the government can’t do to you (not something it must provide for you).  Thinking that something is a good idea doesn’t make it a right.

Help me protect the #ElectoralCollege from progressive activists who are trying to dismantle one of the key protections the U.S. Constitution makes for small states rural Americans and those who believe in limited government: https://t.co/Bi0RNvmAX6 @TaraRoss
I just came up with a new collective name for the Democratic presidential candidates:  “23 and Me.”

I am proud to endorse @ArnoldForAL for U.S. Senate. Arnold is a strong constitutional conservative and the best candidate to beat Doug Jones. He has a proven record of taking on the establishment in Alabama and will do the same in DC.
Who thinks Congress should repeal more laws? https://t.co/q4ayxujXVL #JonesAct
Mike Lee Uses Velociraptors Tauntauns And Aquaman To Dismantle The Green New Deal: https://t.co/YzXpXftutI
